report.title: Filters list
report.description: A general purpose list of filters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM filters f JOIN filters_users fu on fu.filter_id=f.id and fu.deleted=false JOIN users u on u.id=fu.user_id and u.deleted=false JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false #joins# WHERE (f.website_id in (#website_ids#) or f.website_id is null) AND f.deleted=false #order_by#

param.name: created_by_id
param.description: Warehouse user ID of the filter creator

param.name: filter_user_id
param.description: Warehouse user ID of the user who filters are used by.

param.name: filter_sharing_mode
param.description: Select the record sharing mode to list filters for.

column.name: sharing
column.sql: case f.sharing when 'R' then 'Reporting' when 'P' then 'Peer review' when 'V' then 'Verification' when 'D' then 'Data flow' when 'M' then 'Moderation' end
